allow: Bash(# Deep verification of FABRICATED results - search more carefully # For each one, search with multiple patterns echo ""=== s-8 / search-open-buffers ==="" grep -n ''s-8'' /tmp/pre_gnu_emacs.org /tmp/pre_shared.org /tmp/pre_search.org /tmp/pre_spacemacs_new.el /tmp/pre_spacecraft.org /tmp/pre_jay_osx.el /tmp/pre_init.el)
